scripts.build: bash -lc 'shopt -s nullglob; for d in */; do readme="$d/README.md"; index="$d/index.html"; [[ -f "$readme" ]] || continue; grep --quiet "^marp:\s*true" "$readme" || continue; if [[ ! -f "$index" || "$readme" -nt "$index" ]]; then (cd "$d" && npx -y @marp-team/marp-cli@latest --html README.md -o index.html); fi; done'
